module.name: logpolarTransform
module.description: Perform a log-polar transform on an input image and generate a transformed output image.

param.desc: specifies the sub-path from $ICUB_ROOT/app to the configuration file
specifies the direction of the tranform; the alternative direction is LOGPOLAR2CARTESIAN
specifies the number of receptive fields per ring (i.e. the number of samples in the theta/angular dimension); required for CARTESIAN2LOGPOLAR transform direction
specifies the number of rings (i.e. the number of samples in the r dimension); required for CARTESIAN2LOGPOLAR transform direction
specifies the number of samples in the X dimension; required for LOGPOLAR2CARTESIAN transform direction
specifies the number of samples in the Y dimension; required for LOGPOLAR2CARTESIAN transform direction
specifies the relative overlap of each receptive field
